content:
kpshek opened Issue #32

The examples in our current documentation are trivial and lack any clinical relevance. We should add more complex, clinically relevant examples of JSON data (especially in the CDS service response) to our documentation. This will help illustrate what is possible with CDS Hooks.

Related to this, @robs16 made a great suggestion over in #19 to leverage Choosing Wisely when determining appropriate clinically relevant sources.
